TAQA1A03 RDA housekeping

  • When RDA files are too many and because there is only one filesystem, ”/” gets filled. This is what you need to do.
    • Login to taqa1a03
      ssh taqa1a03

      cd to the RDA directory 

      cd /var/www/html/RDA_DATA

      Housekeep all files older than 90 days. 

      sudo find . -mtime +90 -type f -exec rm  {} \;
